title: SeedSwap Mobile App
introduction: SeedSwap is a mobile application concept that aims to empower local gardeners by facilitating the trade of seeds and plants through a community-driven platform.

userPersonas.name: Casual Gardener
userPersonas.description: Enjoys gardening as a hobby, interested in easy plant and seed exchange.

userPersonas.name: Expert Gardener
userPersonas.description: Seeks rare plants and seeds, offers expert advice to the community.

userPersonas.name: Urban Farmer
userPersonas.description: Looks for variety and operational efficiency in urban farming practices.

features.title: Profile Management
features.description: Allows users to manage their profiles, including plant inventories and wish lists.

features.title: Trading Platform
features.description: Facilitates the trading of seeds and plants with listing, search, and exchange features.

features.title: Community Board
features.description: Provides a forum for users to share tips, discuss gardening topics, and organize community events.

features.title: Rating System
features.description: Enables users to leave reviews for other users based on their trading experiences.

userStories.story: As a Casual Gardener, I want to register easily so that I can start trading plants.
As an Expert Gardener, I want to search for specific seeds so that I can expand my collection.
As an Urban Farmer, I want to rate my trading partners to ensure credibility in the community.
